title: Bug: Setting Blank Tooltip in Chart Title Causes Exception on Preview
description: When setting a blank tooltip in the chart title, an exception occurs during the preview.
OB: When a blank tooltip is set in the chart title, an exception occurs when previewing the chart.
EB: The software should handle the scenario of setting a blank tooltip in the chart title gracefully without causing an exception during the preview.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Create a new simple chart.
2. Add a title with interactivity enabled (mouse over/show tooltip).
3. Keep the tooltip text blank.
4. Click the 'Add' button to confirm the settings.
5. Attempt to preview the chart.
